casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Ford Motor Company, Sharonville Transmission Plant, Appellant, v. Johnson et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Ford Motor Co., Sharonville Transm. Plant v. Johnson, 122 Ohio St.3d 540, 2009-Ohio-4049.]

(No. 2008-2220 Submitted July 14, 2009 Decided August 18, 2009.) Roetzel & Andress, Eric G. Bruestle, William P. Coley II, and Ryan E. Bonina, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. *541Harris & Burgin, Andrea L. Burns, and Jonathan W. Croft, for appellee Emma R. Johnson. Richard Cordray, Attorney General, and Douglas R. Unver, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission of Ohio.
